bug.description: okay there is a bug with pytorch 0.4.1 and multi gpu. I am trying to figure out what's wrong But if you see this (line 171 of trainer.py) RuntimeError: arguments are located on different GPUs This is the error triggered, it seems to try to sum items of a list from different GPU. This was not an issue in 0.4.0 Please use pytorch 0.4.0 in the meantime.
